title: Studio in great Midtown Location-68 -14 W. Ferry Studio
posting_body: These charming apartments have hardwood floors, large closets and plenty of light.
What really sets these apartments apart is the extra bonus room in the front.
These apartments rarely come available, so grab one if you can.
Great value for the best location in Midtown.
DIA, Wayne State, CCS, HopCat, countless restaurants and shops all steps from your front door.
The ideal place to enjoy Detroit's Best Neighborhood.
CALL TODAY TO SET UP SHOWING
Security Deposit Equal to rental rate ($650)
Conveniently located in the heart of Midtown
Access to Wayne State Parking Structure 1
Walking distance to shopping, entertainment, restaurants, museums and hospitals
For more information visit <URL> and look under Studio in building 68 W. Ferry the Fee Apartments.
Visit us at our office at 100 W. Ferry Street
We require Proof of income, employment, background and credit check from all our tenants.
Keywords: Midtown, Apartments, LIVE MIDTOWN PROGRAM eligible, Wayne State Housing, WSU, CCS, Center for Creative Studies, DMC, Detroit Medical Center
